title: Vision Science 2015: Computer vision, human vision, and your vision (Tokyo Institute of Technology)
text: ( Source : Tokyo Institute of Technology ) When designing a machine that automatically recognizes the environment and is safe and intuitive for the human user, learning about both computer vision and human vision, together with some background
